name: 戦隊PAD
description:
Super Sentai PAD is available as an App !
You can enjoy fighting games and quizzes by flicking, tapping or
multi-shot-button-mashing in "Play with app" mode.
In "Play online" mode, you can see character introduction when connected
to "Super Sentai PAD" which is sold seperately.

【How to play】
[1]Play with the app
Select and tap the game on the selection screen.
When tapping on a character, you will be able to hear the names of the
characters.
"Red Senshi Zukan" has a quiz mode. Find the right answer hero and tap !
Battle game is included with a mode in which you can activate special
moves by flicking along the guide!!
Attack with special weapons of GOKAIGER and GO-ONGER.
You can play with two more additional games, if you let the application communicate with "Super Sentao PAD" which is sold separately.

[2]Play with the app and toy
Set the "Super Sentai PAD" sheet which is sold separately to iPad.
Control the "Super Sentai PAD", and try to "Kamituki Gattai" and "Kyoryu
Change"! You will be able to see character information on the screen.

This application has sound features. Please set up the sound volume
level before playing.
※Compatible handsets are iphone4, iphone4S, iphone5, iPad 3rd, iPad 4th,
iPad mini, iPod touch(4th generation), iPod touch(5th generation)
(Needs to be updated to iOS5.1 or higher.)
※Please check the website for more information about Super Sentai PAD
sold separately.
　http://www.b-boys.jp/sentai/kyouryu/products/others/sentai_pad/
